name: Robo-Clash 1999
description:
In the distant future of the year 1999 scientists have created phenomenally powerful robots with A COLOSSAL 10MBs OF RAM with absolutely NO REGARD for whether or not they should. 

These robots are pitted against each other in action-packed battles where they can store instructions for UP TO 10 SECONDS OF INTENSE COMBAT at a time.

In this game you take command of such a robot, trying to best your opponent in the ULTIMATE CYBER-CEREBRAL challenge.
